original_text: After the soldiers caught Peter, they put him in prison. While he was in prison, four different groups of soldiers guarded him. There were four soldiers in each group. Herod wanted to judge Peter in front of everybody. After the Passover festival had finished, he would bring Peter out of the prison to do this.
korean_text: 잡으매 옥에 가두어 군인 넷씩인 네 패에게 맡겨 지키고 유월절 후에 백성 앞에 끌어 내고자 하더라

sentences.original_text: four different groups of soldiers guarded him
sentences.korean_translation: 네 개의 다른 군병 그룹이 그를 지켰습니다

sentences.original_text: There were four soldiers in each group
sentences.korean_translation: 각 그룹에는 네 명의 군병이 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: After the Passover festival had finished
he would bring Peter out of the prison
